content:
this one seems to be a pub bug : from the log:

Internal error in location for message: 'Error in ?? at 1, 1: Premature ExpressionNode termination at unexpected token ":"', loc = 'http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/', err = 'The reference Reference(Organization) could not be resolved'

this can be seen in the full view of Organization where the sliced elements have Reference(Organization) that breaks

pasted image

the other bad links look like they are slice related too....
e.g.,

error   The link 'StructureDefinition-us-core-pulse-oximetry-definitions.html#Observation.component:FlowRateSlice.valueQuantity' for "valueQuantity" cannot be resolved
(valid targets: [page-content-wrapper, Observation.code.coding:OxygenSatCode, Observation.encounter,
Observation.reference...
@Grahame Grieve can you take a look at these link errors here
